entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
